lines.pinyin: lu2 ho2! lu2 gio3(2) mig4(8) gai5?
lines.english: Hi! What's your name?

lines.pinyin: ua2 gio3(2) a1 bhung5. lu2 ne1 ?
lines.english: My name is A-Bhung. And you?

lines.pinyin: ua2 gio3(2) a1 hua1. i1 si6(7) di7 diang1?
lines.english: My name is A-Hua. Who is she?

lines.pinyin: i1 si6(7) ua2 gai5(7) a1 ze2.
lines.english: She is my older sister.

lines.pinyin: lu2 do6(7) di7 go3(2) lai5?
lines.english: Where are you from?

lines.pinyin: nang2 do6(7) ing3(2) ni5 lai5. lu2 kia6(7) di7 go3?
lines.english: We're from Indonesia. Where do you live?

lines.teochew: 我在牛車水。汝偌當時到個？
lines.pinyin: ua2 kia6(7) do7 ghu5(7) cla1 zui2. lu2 nang7 diang1 si5 gao3 gai5?
lines.english: I live in Chinatown. When did you arrive?

lines.pinyin: nang2 za2(1) rig8 gao3 gai5
lines.english: We arrived yesterday.

lines.pinyin: zo1 ni5(7) oi6(7) lai5(7) sing1 gia1 bo1?
lines.english: Why did you come to Singapore?

lines.pinyin: ing1 ui5(7) nang2 lai5(7) tig8 to5.
lines.english: Because we came for travel.

lines.pinyin: lu2 gag4 deg4 zi2 go3 zai6(7) sen1 ?
lines.english: How do you find this place?

lines.pinyin: ua2 gag4 deg4 zi2 go3 zing1 ngia2
lines.english: I think it's beautiful here!

lines.pinyin: Wā! ka2(1) sī7 lu2 hā1? lu2 huan1 gi3(2) dég4 ua2 bhoi6?
lines.english: Wow! Is that you? Do you still remember me?

lines.teochew: 是阿花咧？好久無遇到了！
lines.pinyin: lu2 sī7 a1 huā5? hoh4(8) gu2(3) bho5(7) ngo6 lu2 liu2.
lines.english: Are you A-Hua? Long time no see!

lines.teochew: 誒，我是阿花，汝咧做啥物？
lines.pinyin: dīoh4(8), ua1 sī6(7) a1 huā5. lu2 zī6(6) zung5 zo3(2) muēh8?
lines.english: Yes, I’m A-Hua. How are you now?

lines.teochew: 我真好，感謝。汝呢？汝做什麼工？
lines.pinyin: gua2 jin2 hó, gám2(1) siā7. lu2 ne1? lu2 do6(7) zo3(2) mih4(8) gang1?
lines.english: I’m good, thank you. And you? What kind of work are you doing?

lines.teochew: 我做老師，還是在銀行做工無？
lines.pinyin: ua2 zī2(6) zung5 sī7 sing1 sēn1. lu2 huan1 sī6(7) do6(7) ngēng5(7) hang5 zo3(2) gang1 bho5?
lines.english: I’m a teacher now. Are you still working at the bank?

lines.pinyin: bho5 liēu2, ua2 zī2(6) zung5 do6(7) laī6 zo3(2) gang1.
lines.english: Not anymore, I work from home now.

lines.pinyin: lu2 ho2, ua2 oi6(7) sai2(1) toin2(1) zi2(1) gai5 bhoi6?
lines.english: Hi, can I take a look at this keychain?

lines.teochew: 會使。只個罔個十銖，三個二十五銖。
lines.pinyin: oi6(7) sai2. zi2(1) gai5 zêg8(4) gai5 zab8(4) kou1, san1 gai5 ri6(7) zab8(4) ngou6(7) kou1
lines.english: Of course. One is 10 ringgit, or three for 25.

lines.teochew: 好，我愛三個。還有，只本薄若銖？
lines.pinyin: ho2, ua2 ain3 san1 gai5. huan1 i6, zi2(1) bung2(1) pou6 rioh8(4) zoi7 lui5?
lines.english: Okay, I’ll take three. Also, how much is this book?

lines.pinyin: zêg8(4) bung2 zab8(4) ri6(7) kou1
lines.english: One is 12 ringgit.

lines.pinyin: an1 nei2 ua2 ia7 ain3 zêg8(4) bung2(1) pou6
lines.english: Then I’ll take one book too.

lines.teochew: 今日早早，我就合我個查某朋友
lines.chinese: 今天一大早，我就和我女朋友
lines.pinyin: gim1 rig8 za2(6) za2(3), ua2 ziu6(7) ga4 ua2 gai5(7) za1 t1 bhou2(1) pēng5(7) iu2
lines.english: Early this morning, I made plans with my girlfriend

lines.teochew: 約好做䟘去坵底食早頓。
lines.pinyin: ioh4 ho2 zo3(2) bu5(7) ke3 bo1 doi2 ziah8(4) za2(1) deng3
lines.english: to go downtown for breakfast.

lines.pinyin: i1 ngô6(7) dioh4 ua2 ziu6(7) cio3(2) cio3 cia3:
lines.english: When she saw me, she smiled and said:

lines.pinyin: “za2 a! lu2 gim1 rig8 zo3(2) ni5(7) an1 ne1 za2(1) gao3?”
lines.english: “Morning! How come you're so early today?”

lines.pinyin: ua2 cio3(2) cio3 huê5 i1(7):
lines.english: I smiled and replied:

lines.chinese: “我今天醒得早，当然不会迟到！”
lines.pinyin: “ua2 gim1 rig8 za2(6) cên2(3), dian7 dioh8 bhoi6(7) sai2(1) uan3(2) gao3!”
lines.english: “I woke up early today, so of course I wouldn’t be late!”

lines.teochew: 俺去了許間俺恁去個咖啡店，
lines.chinese: 我们去了平时常去的咖啡店，
lines.pinyin: nang2 ke3(2) lieu1(7) he2(1) gni1 nang2 diam7 ke3 gai5(7) go1 bi5(7) diam3,
lines.english: We went to our usual café,

lines.pinyin: gio3(2) lieu2(1) go1 bi5,
lines.english: and ordered coffee.

lines.pinyin: lo-ti huan1 u6(7) buan3(2) sén1 sêg8 gai5(7) nêng,
lines.english: and soft-boiled eggs,

lines.pinyin: tao5(7) ziah8 tao5(7) puêh8(4) uē7.
lines.english: we chatted while eating.

lines.teochew: 伊咧伊只幾時做工有滴困乏，
lines.chinese: 她说她这几天工作有点累，
lines.pinyin: i1 dan3 i1 zi2(1) gui2(6) si5 zo3(2) gang1 u6(7) dri4(8) gian2(3) hēg8,
lines.english: She said she had been feeling a bit tired from work recently,

lines.pinyin: ua2 ziu6(7) gah4 i1 dan3:
lines.english: so I told her:

lines.pinyin: mai3(2) siong6 lieu2,
lines.english: “Don’t worry about it,

lines.teochew: 禮拜日儂會使好休息一下。”
lines.chinese: 星期天我们可以好好休息一下。”
lines.pinyin: loi2(1) bai3(2) rig8 nang2 oi6(7) sai2(1) ho2(2) ho2(3) hiu1 sêg4 zêg8(4) ē7.
lines.english: we can rest well on Sunday.”

lines.pinyin: ziah8(4) ho2(1) za2(1) deng3 ao6,
lines.english: After breakfast,

lines.teochew: 俺去只蹛近近個花園行行，
lines.chinese: 我们去附近的公园走走，
lines.pinyin: nang2 ke3(2) zi2(1) go3 geng6(7) geng6 gai5(7) hue1 hng5 gian5(7) gian5,
lines.english: we took a walk at the nearby park,

lines.pinyin: tīn si5 zing1 ho2,
lines.english: The weather was really nice,

lines.pinyin: rig8(4) tao5 ngam1 ngam1 ho2,
lines.english: the sun wasn't too hot,

lines.pinyin: huang1 ia7 zing1 liang5.
lines.english: and the wind was cool.

lines.pinyin: nang2 tao5(7) gian5 tao5(7) dan3(2) uē7,
lines.english: As we walked and talked,

lines.pinyin: toin2(1) dioh8(4) u6(7) nou5 gian2 pah4(8) giu5,
lines.english: we saw some kids playing ball,

lines.teochew: 還有一對翁姐坐在長椅曬日。
lines.chinese: 还有一对夫妻坐在长椅上晒太阳。
lines.pinyin: huan1 u6(7) zêg8(4) dui3 ang3 zia2 zo6(7) deng5(7) in2 pag8(4) rig8.
lines.english: and a couple sitting on a bench sunbathing.

lines.chinese: 下午我们去了百货公司，
lines.pinyin: e7 gua3 nang2 ke3(2) lieu2(1) beh4(8) gong1 si1,
lines.english: In the afternoon, we went to the department store,

lines.pinyin: bhoi2(1) lieu5 mueh8(4) gian6,
lines.english: bought a few things,

lines.teochew: 还顺续买乜伊想要个杯。
lines.chinese: 还顺便买了她想要的杯子。
lines.pinyin: huan1 sung5(7) sua3 bhoi2(1) koih4 i1 siong6(7) ain3 gai5(7) bué1
lines.english: and also picked up the cup she had been wanting to buy.

lines.pinyin: gao3(2) e7 gua3 san1 diang2(1) cug4,
lines.english: Around 3 p.m.,

lines.teochew: 俺遇着了我一個真久無遇个朋友，
lines.chinese: 我们遇见了一个很久没见的朋友，
lines.pinyin: nang2 ngo6(7) dioh8(4) lieu2(1) ua2 zêg8(4) gai5(7) zing1 gu5 bho5(7) ngo6 gai5(7) pèng5(7) iu2,
lines.english: we ran into a friend I hadn’t seen in a long time.

lines.pinyin: ua2 men6 men6(7) gio3 i1(7):
lines.english: I quickly called out to him:

lines.pinyin: “Ei! lu2 zo3(2) ni oi6(7) do6(7) zi(1) go3?”
lines.english: “Hey! How come you are here too?”

lines.pinyin: i1 ia7 siong6(7) m6(7) gao3,
lines.english: He was surprised too,

lines.pinyin: lieu2 nang2 ziu6(7) dan3(2) gua8 gu8 ue7,
lines.english: and we chatted for a bit,

lines.pinyin: puêh8(4) u6 puêh8(4) bho5.
lines.english: It was a warm and lively chat.

lines.pinyin: am3(2) mên5 nang2 ziu6(7) deng2(1) lai6 lieu2,
lines.english: In the evening, we went home,

lines.pinyin: gag4 nang5(7) gag4 nang5 hiu1 sêg4.
lines.english: and each took some time to rest.

lines.teochew: 今日雖然是普通個蜀日。
lines.chinese: 今天虽然是平常的一天，
lines.pinyin: gim1 rig8 sui1 riang5 si6(7) pou2(1) tong1 gai5(7) zêg8(4) rig8,
lines.english: Even though today was just an ordinary day

lines.pinyin: dang6(7) si6(7) ing1 ui7 u6(7) i1 buê5 ua2(3),
lines.english: because she was with me

lines.pinyin: ua2 oi6(7) gag4 dêg4 zing1 huan1 hi2
lines.english: I felt really happy.

lines.pinyin: ua2 u6(7) zeg8(4) gai5(7) kuai3(2) lag8 gai5(7) gê1 tèng1.
lines.english: I have a happy family.

lines.teochew: 家里有阿爸、阿妈、阿兄、阿妹、阿公
lines.chinese: 家里有爸爸、妈妈、哥哥、妹妹、爷爷
lines.pinyin: gê1 lai6 u6(7) a1 ba5, a1 ma5, a1 hian1, a1 muê6, a1 gong1
lines.english: There are dad, mom, older brother, younger sister, and grandfather

lines.pinyin: gah4 ua2.
lines.english: and me.

lines.teochew: 阿爸是老君，阿妈是先生，
lines.chinese: 爸爸是医生，妈妈是老师，
lines.pinyin: a1 ba5 si6(7) lao1 gung1, a1 ma5 si6(7) sing1 sên1,
lines.english: My dad is a doctor, my mom is a teacher,

lines.teochew: 阿兄讀大學，阿妹讀細学，
lines.chinese: 哥哥在读大学，妹妹在读小学，
lines.pinyin: a1 hian1 tag8(4) dai6(7) hag8, a1 muê6 tag8(4) soi3(2) hag8,
lines.english: My brother is in university, and my sister is in primary school,

lines.pinyin: a1 gong1 to3(2) hiun1 lieu2.
lines.english: My grandfather is retired.

lines.pinyin: ua2 si6(7) zêg8(4) gai5(7) hag8(4) sêng1.
lines.english: I am a student.

lines.teochew: 我愛我個家儂，俺恆恆做䟘食饭、
lines.chinese: 我爱我的家人，我们经常一起吃饭、
lines.pinyin: ua2 ain3 ua2 gai5(7) gê1 nang5, nang2 diam7 diam7 zo3(2) bu5(7) ziah8(4) bung7,
lines.english: I love my family. We often eat together,

lines.pinyin: puêh8(4) uê7, toin2(1) hi3,
lines.english: chat, watch movies,

lines.pinyin: gah4 oi6(7) zo3(2) bu5(7) ke3(2) gong1 hng5 gian5(7) gian5
lines.english: and sometimes go for walks in the park.

lines.teochew: 除了家儂，我也有真敆好友。
lines.chinese: 除了家人，我也有很多好朋友。
lines.pinyin: de7 lieu7 gê1 nang5, ua2 ia7 u6(7) zing1 zoi7 ho2(1) pēng5(7) iu2.
lines.english: Besides my family, I also have many good friends.

lines.teochew: 俺做䟘讀書、做功課、耍遊戲。
lines.chinese: 我们一起读书、做功课、玩游戏。
lines.pinyin: nang2 zo3(2) bu5(7) tag8(4) ze1, zo2 gang1 kue3, seng2(1) iu7 hin3
lines.english: We go to class, do homework, and play games together.

lines.teochew: 朋友对我好，我有问题时，伊儂会相輔我。
lines.chinese: 朋友对我很好，我有问题时，他们会帮助我。
lines.pinyin: pēng5(7) iu2 dui1 ua2(6) ho2(3), ua2 u6(7) meng7 doi5 si5, i1 nang5(7) oi6(7) sio1 hu6(7) ua2.
lines.english: My friends are nice to me. When I have problems, they help me.

lines.pinyin: ua2 ia7 oi6(7) guang1 sim1 i1 nang5(7).
lines.english: I also care about them.

lines.teochew: 我覺得家儂合朋友真重要。
lines.chinese: 我觉得家人和朋友很重要。
lines.pinyin: ua2 gag4 dég4 gê1 nang5 gah4 pēng5(7)
lines.english: I think family and friends are important.

lines.teochew: 伊儂會物我個生活愈更歡喜。
lines.pinyin: iu2 zing1 dong6(7) iao3. i1 nang5(7) oi6(7) muêh8(4) ua2 gai5(7) sên1 uah8 ru2(1) gêng1 huan1 hi2
lines.english: They make my life happier.

lines.teochew: 俺會做䟘关心相輔，按呢俺個关系会愈愈愈好。
lines.chinese: 我们会互相关心和帮助，这样我们的关系会越来越好。
lines.pinyin: nang2 dioh4 zo3(2) bu5(7) guang1 sim1 sio1 hu6, an1 ne1 nang2 gai5(7) guang1 hi6 oi6(7) ru2(6) lai5 ru2(6) ho2(3).
lines.english: We should care for and help each other, so our relationships can become better and better.

lines.teochew: 汝好，阿财。汝禮拜日做乜也個？
lines.chinese: 你好，阿财。你星期天做什么？
lines.pinyin: lu2 ho2, a1 cai5. lu2 loi2(1) bai3(2) rig8 zo3(2) mig4(8) gai5?
lines.english: Hi, A-Cai. What did you do over the Sunday?

lines.pinyin: ua2 deng2(1) lao6(7) cu3 toin2(1) gê1 nang5. lu2 ne1?
lines.english: I went back to my hometown to see my family. How about you?

lines.teochew: 我在內陪阿爸阿媽。你內有幾個儂？
lines.chinese: 我在家陪爸爸妈妈。你家里有几个人？
lines.pinyin: ua2 do6(7) lai6 buê5(7) a1-ba5 a1-ma5. lu2 lai6 u6(7) gui2(1) gai5(7) nang5?
lines.english: I stayed home with my parents. How many people are in your family?

lines.teochew: 我內有六個儂：阿公、阿嫲、阿爸、
lines.chinese: 我家有六个人：爷爷、奶奶、爸爸、
lines.pinyin: ua2 lai6 u6(7) lag8(4) gai5(7) nang5: a1-gong1, a1-ma2, a1-ba5,
lines.english: There are six people in my family: grandpa, grandma, dad,

lines.pinyin: a1-ma5, a-muê6 gah4 ua2.
lines.english: mom, my younger sister, and me.

lines.pinyin: nang2 zo3(2) bu5(7) kia6.
lines.english: We all live together.

lines.teochew: 真鬧熱！汝合阿妹感情好麼？
lines.chinese: 真热闹！你和妹妹感情好吗？
lines.pinyin: zing1 lao7 riag8! lu2 gah4 a1-muê6 gam2(6) cêng5 ho2 mo2?
lines.english: So lively! Do you have a good relationship with your younger sister?

lines.pinyin: lu2 su1 gah4 mih4(8) gai5(7) sêg4?
lines.english: What color do you like?

lines.pinyin: ua2 su1 gah4 nam5(7) sêg4.
lines.english: I like blue.

lines.pinyin: lu2 nê1?
lines.english: How about you?

lines.pinyin: ua2 su1 gah4 ang5(7) sêg4 gah4 ng5(7) sêg4.
lines.english: I like red and yellow.

lines.pinyin: lu2 su1 gah4 mih4(8) gai5(7) hêng5?
lines.english: What shape do you like?

lines.pinyin: ua2 su1 gah4 in5(7) hêng5.
lines.english: I like circles.

lines.pinyin: ing1 ui7 i1 toin2(1) ki2(3) lai5(7) zing1 cu3(2) bhî7.
lines.english: Because they look cute.

lines.pinyin: ua2 ia7 si6!
lines.english: Me too!

lines.teochew: 汝睇，许个是一粒蓝色个圆形。
lines.chinese: 你看，那是一个蓝色的圆形。
lines.pinyin: lu2 toin2, he2 gai5 si6(7) zeg8(4) gai5(7) nam5(7) sêg4 gai5(7) in5(7) hêng5.
lines.english: Look, that’s a blue circle.

lines.teochew: 着！坪畔许个红色是三角形？
lines.chinese: 对！旁边那个红色的是三角形吗？
lines.pinyin: dioh8! pian5(7) bain5 he2 gai5(7) ang5(7) sêg4 ka2(1)-si5(7) san1 gag4(8) hêng5?
lines.english: Right! Is that red one next to it a triangle?

lines.teochew: 唔是，许个是红色个四方形。
lines.chinese: 不是，那个是红色的四方形。
lines.pinyin: m6(7)-si6, he2 gai5 si6(7) ang5(7) sêg4 gai5(7) si3(2) bang1 hêng5.
lines.english: No, that’s a red square.

lines.pinyin: O, ua2 toin2(1) sa-la lieu2.
lines.english: Oh, I saw it wrong.

lines.teochew: 按呢汝觉得绿色个长方形做物？
lines.chinese: 那么你觉得绿色的长方形怎么样？
lines.pinyin: an1-ne1 lu2 gag4(8) dêg4 cên1 sêg4 gai5(7) si3(2) bang1 hêng5 zo3(2) muêh8?
lines.english: What do you think of the green rectangle?

lines.pinyin: ua2 gag4(8) dêg4 zing1 ho2(6) toin2(3).
lines.english: I think it looks nice.

lines.pinyin: sêg4 gah4 hêng5 zing1 ngia2!
lines.english: Both the color and the shape are beautiful!

conversations.subtitle: Lesson 11: A Day in the Park

lines.pinyin: gim1 rig8 ua2 ke3(2) gong1 hng5.
lines.english: Today I went to the park.

lines.pinyin: toin2(1) dioh8(4) lieu2(1) zing1 zoi7 muêh8(4) gian6.
lines.english: I saw many things.

lines.pinyin: zi2(1) gai5(7) huê1 hng5 u6(7) zing1 zoi7 huê1.
lines.english: This garden has many flowers.

lines.pinyin: huê1 si6(7) ang5(7) sêg4 gah4 ng5(7) sêg4 gai5.
lines.english: The flowers are red and yellow.

lines.pinyin: he2 coh4 ciu7 u6(7) cen1 sêg4 gai5(7) hioh8.
lines.english: Those trees have green leaves.

lines.pinyin: toin2(1) ki2(3) lai5(7) zing1 su1 hoh8.
lines.english: They look very nice.

lines.teochew: 我睇着一个蓝色个四方盒。
lines.chinese: 我看到一个蓝色的方盒子。
lines.pinyin: ua2 toin2(1) dioh4 zêg8(4) gai5(7) nam5(7) sêg4 gai5(7) si3(2) bang1 ab8.
lines.english: I saw a blue square box.

lines.pinyin: bang3(2) do6(7) gao1 in2(6) deng2(3).
lines.english: It was on a chair.

lines.pinyin: ua2 m6(7) zai1 si6(7) di7 diang1 gai5.
lines.english: I didn’t know whose it was.

lines.pinyin: ua2 meng7: “zi2(1) gai5 si6(7) di7 diang1 gai5(7) ab8?”
lines.english: I asked, 'Whose box is this?'

lines.pinyin: zêg8(4) gai5(7) nou5 gian2 dan3: “si6(7) ua2 gai5!”
lines.english: A child said, 'It’s mine!'

lines.pinyin: ua2 huan1 toin2(1) dioh4 zêg8(4) coh4 uê7 dou5.
lines.english: I also saw some paintings.

lines.teochew: 只撮画有圆形、三角形合四方形。
lines.chinese: 这些画有圆形、三角形和方形。
lines.pinyin: zi2(1) coh4 uê7 dou5 u6(7) in5(7) hêng5, san1 gag4(8) hêng5 gah4 si3(2) bang1 hêng5.
lines.english: These paintings had circles, triangles, and squares.

lines.pinyin: sêg4 ia7 zing1 zoi7.
lines.english: There were many colors too.

lines.pinyin: u6(7) hung2(1) ang5(7) sêg4, gan1 sêg4 gah4 huê1 sêg4.
lines.english: Like pink, orange, and gray.

lines.pinyin: ua2 gag4(8) dêg4 zing1 ngia2.
lines.english: I thought they were very beautiful.

lines.pinyin: ua2 su1-gah4 sêg4 gah4 hêng5(7) zuang6.
lines.english: I like colors and shapes.

lines.teochew: 因为伊儂物世界愈更雅。
lines.chinese: 因为它们让世界更漂亮。
lines.pinyin: ing1 ui7 i1 nang5 muêh8(4) si3(2) gai3 ru2(1) gêng1 ngia2.
lines.english: Because they make the world more beautiful.

lines.chinese: 你觉得哪个颜色最特别？
lines.pinyin: lu2 gag4(8) dêg4 mih4(8) gai5(7) sêg4 siang5(7) dêg8(4) biag8?
lines.english: Which color do you think is the most special?

lines.teochew: 我觉得每个颜色真特别。
lines.chinese: 我觉得每个颜色都很特别。
lines.pinyin: ua2 gag4(8) dêg4 muê2(1) gai5(7) sêg4 zing1 dêg8(4) biag8.
lines.english: I think every color is special.

lines.pinyin: muê2(1) gai5(7) hêng5(7) zuang6 u6(7) êng7 cu3.
lines.english: And every shape is useful.

lines.pinyin: zi6 zung1 si6(7) ri6(7) kang1(3) ri6(7) ngou6 lag8 ghuêh8(4) ri6(7) zab8(4) boih4(8) ho7, bai3(2) lag8.
lines.english: Now it is June 28, 2025, Saturday.

lines.pinyin: sui1 riang5 gim1 rig8 bang3(2) gê3.
lines.english: Although today is a holiday,

lines.teochew: 但是我逐日做工个时间合安排攏差唔多。
lines.chinese: 但是我每天上班的时间和安排都差不多。
lines.pinyin: dang6(7) si6(7) ua2 dag8(4) rig8 zo3(2) gang1 gai5(7) si5(7) gang1 gah4 ang1 bai5 long6 ca1 m6(7) do1.
lines.english: My daily work schedule and routine are almost the same.

lines.pinyin: bho5(7) mih4(8) gai5(7) dêg8(4) biag8 gai5.
lines.english: There is nothing very special.

lines.pinyin: dag8(4) rig8 za2(6) ki2(3) cêg4(8) diang2 ua2 zao2(6) cên2(3).
lines.english: Every morning at seven I wake up.

lines.pinyin: cêg4(8) diang2(1) buan3 cug4(8) mung5.
lines.english: At half past seven, I leave home.

lines.pinyin: boih4(8) diang2(1) cug4 gao3(2) gong1 si1.
lines.english: Around eight, I reach the office.

lines.teochew: 到我个做工位，我会先开电脑。
lines.chinese: 到办公桌，我会先打开电脑。
lines.pinyin: gao3(2) ua2 gai6(7) zo3(2) gang1 ui7, ua2 oi6(7) soin1 kui1 diang6(7) nao2.
lines.english: At my desk, I first turn on the computer.

lines.pinyin: cê5(7) toin2(1) u6(7) sêng3 rib8 bho5.
lines.english: I check if there are emails.

lines.chinese: 然后开始安排当天的工作。
lines.pinyin: liou2 kai1 si2 ang1 bai5(7) hê2(6) rig8 gai5(7) gang1.
lines.english: Then I arrange the day's work.

lines.teochew: 十一点我在睇文件，写物件。
lines.chinese: 十一点我都在看文件，写东西。
lines.pinyin: zab8(4) êg4(8) diang2 ua2 lo1 toin2(1) bhung5(7) gian6, sia2(1) muêh8(4) gian6.
lines.english: At eleven, I read documents and write.

lines.pinyin: u6(7) si5 oi6(7) kui1 huê6.
lines.english: Sometimes I have meetings.

lines.teochew: 十二点了，我合同事做瓠食饭。
lines.chinese: 十二点了，我和同事一起吃饭。
lines.pinyin: zab8(4) ri6(7) diang2 liou2, ua2 gah4 dang5(7) su7 zo3(2) bu5(7) ziah8(4) bung7.
lines.english: At twelve, I eat lunch with colleagues.

lines.pinyin: hiun1 sêg4 gao3(2) êg4(8) diang2(3).
lines.english: We rest until one o’clock.

lines.teochew: 食下界後我有时會敲電話。
lines.pinyin: ziah8(4) e7 gua3 ao6 ua2 u6(7) si5 oi6(7) ka3(2) diang6(7) uê7.
lines.english: In the afternoon, I sometimes make phone calls.

lines.teochew: 也會帖明日愛用个物件。
lines.chinese: 也会整理明天要用的东西。
lines.pinyin: ia7 oi6(7) tiag4 ma2 rig8 ain3(2) êng7 gai5(7) muêh8(4) gian6.
lines.english: I also prepare the things I need for tomorrow.

lines.teochew: 到五点半，我就放工轉內了。
lines.chinese: 到五点半，我就下班回家了。
lines.pinyin: gao3(2) ngou6(7) diang2(1) buan3, ua2 ziu6(7) bang3(2) gang1 deng2(1) lai6 lieu2.
lines.english: At five thirty, I finish work and go home.

lines.teochew: 那是还有力，我會去运动三十分钟。
lines.chinese: 如果还有力气，我会去运动三十分钟。
lines.pinyin: na2(3) si6(7) huan1 u6(7) lag8, ua2 oi6(7) ke3(2) ung7 dong6 san1 zab8(4) hung1 zeng1.
lines.english: If I still have energy, I exercise for thirty minutes.

lines.pinyin: am3(2) mên5 ceg4(8) diang2(1) buan3 ziah8(4) bung7.
lines.english: At seven thirty in the evening, I eat dinner.

lines.teochew: 了就看看电视，听听歌一下。
lines.chinese: 然后就看看电视，听听歌一下。
lines.pinyin: liao2 ziu6(7) toin2(1) toin2(1) diang6(7) si6, tian1 tian1 go1 zêg8(4) ê7.
lines.english: Then I watch TV and listen to some music.

lines.teochew: 十点半左右，我就会去夗。
lines.chinese: 十点半左右，我就会去睡觉。
lines.pinyin: zab8(4) diang2(1) buan3 zo2 iu6, ua2 ziu6(7) oi6(7) ke3(2) ug8.
lines.english: Around ten thirty, I go to bed.

lines.teochew: 只陣六月尾了，我觉得时间过了真猛。
lines.chinese: 现在六月尾了，我觉得时间过得真快。
lines.pinyin: zi2(6) zung5 lag8(4) ghuêh8(4) bhuê2 lieu2, ua2 gag4(8) dêg4 si5(7) gang1 guê3(2) lieu2(1) zing1 mên2.
lines.english: Now it is the end of June, and I feel time passes very quickly.

lines.teochew: 希望加幾個月个2025年會愈來愈好。
lines.chinese: 希望多几个月的2025年会越来越好。
lines.pinyin: hi1 mo7 gê1 gui2(1) gai5(1) ghuêh8 gai5(7) ri6(7) kang1(3) ri6(7) ngou6(7) ni5 oi6(7) ru2(6) lai5 ru2(6) ho2(3).
lines.english: I hope the rest of 2025 will get better and better.

lines.teochew: 只陣是幾號？我只幾時惦惦不記得今日幾號。
lines.chinese: 现在是几号？我最近常常忘记今天是几号。
lines.pinyin: zi2(6) zung5 si6(7) gui2(1) ho7? ua2 zi2(1) gui2(6) si5 diam3 diam3 bhoi6(7) gi4(8) dêg4 gim1 rig8 gui2(1) ho7.
lines.english: What date is it today? Recently I often forget the date.

lines.teochew: 今日是六月二十八號，拜六，汝豈是真無閑？
lines.chinese: 今天是6月28号，星期六～你是不是太忙了吧？
lines.pinyin: gim1 rig8 si6(7) lag8 ghuêh8(4) ri6(7) zab8(4) boih4(8) ho7, bai3(2) lag8, lu2 ka2(1) si6(7) zing1 bho5(7) oin5?
lines.english: Today is June 28th, Saturday. Are you really that busy?

lines.teochew: 有影無？我想今日拜五啢……
lines.chinese: 真的假的，我还以为今天才星期五……
lines.pinyin: u6(7) ian2 bho5? ua2 sion6(7) da1(7) gim1 rig8 bai3(2) ngou6 nia7.
lines.english: Really? I thought today was Friday...

lines.teochew: 汝是佮乏了吧？昨日豈是做工到真暗？
lines.chinese: 你是太累了吧？昨天是不是加班到很晚？
lines.pinyin: lu2 si6(7) kah4 hêg8 liao2 bhoi6? za2(1) rig8 ka2(1) si6(7) zo3(2) gang1 gao3(2) zing1 am3?
lines.english: You must be exhausted. Did you work overtime until late yesterday?

lines.teochew: 是阿，昨日做工到十點。頭有滴囝暈。汝昨日做乜個？
lines.chinese: 对啊，昨天忙到十点，头都晕了。你昨天做什么？
lines.pinyin: si6 a1, za2(1) rig8 zo3(2) gang1 gao3(2) zab8(4) diang2. tao5 u6(7) dih4(8) gian2(3) hing5. lu2 za2(1) rig8 zo3(2) mih4(8) gai5?
lines.english: Yeah, I worked until ten yesterday, my head was spinning. What about you?

lines.teochew: 我昨日請假，一日在內休息。
lines.chinese: 我昨天请假，一整天在家休息。
lines.pinyin: ua2 za2(1) rig8 cian2(6) gian2(3), zêg8(4) rig8 do6(7) lai6 hiu1 sêg4.
lines.english: I took the day off yesterday and rested at home.

lines.pinyin: an1 ne1 lu2 man2 rig8 u6(7) su7 bho5?
lines.english: So, do you have plans tomorrow?

lines.teochew: 我應該陪阿爸阿媽去買物件。汝呢？
lines.chinese: 我应该陪我爸妈去买东西。你呢？
lines.pinyin: ua2 êng3(2) gai1 buê5(7) a1 ba1 a1 ma1 ke3(2) bhoi2(1) muêh8(4) gian6. lu2 ne1?
lines.english: I should go shopping with my parents. How about you?

lines.teochew: 我會在內休息。只幾時真實是真乏。
lines.chinese: 我会在家休息。这几天真的很累。
lines.pinyin: ua2 oi6(7) do6(7) lai6 hiu1 sêg4. zi2(1) gui2(6) si5 zêng1 sêg8 si6(7) zing1 hêg8.
lines.english: I’ll just rest at home. These past few days have been exhausting.

lines.teochew: 按呢汝記得後日着愛去公司，早起九點有開會。
lines.chinese: 那你记得后天要去公司，早上九点有开会。
lines.pinyin: an1 ne1 lu2 gi3(2) dêg4 ao6 rig8(4) dioh4 ain3(2) ke3(2) gong1 si1, za2(6) ki2(3) gao2(6) diang2(3) u6(7) kui1 huê6.
lines.english: Then don’t forget, the day after tomorrow you need to go to the office, there’s a meeting at 9am.

lines.teochew: 是阿，後日是拜一。我真實無愛去。
lines.chinese: 对哦，后天礼拜一。我真的不想去。
lines.pinyin: si6 a1, ao6 rig8(4) si6(7) bai3(2) êg4. ua2 zêng1 sêg8 bho5(7) ain3(2) ke3.
lines.english: Right, the day after tomorrow is Monday. I really don’t want to go.

lines.teochew: 汝下個禮拜個時間表睇吗？
lines.chinese: 你下礼拜时间表看了吗？
lines.pinyin: lu2 ê6(7) gai5(7) loi2(1) bai3 gai5(7) si5(7) gang1 biao2 toin2 bhoi6(7)?
lines.english: Have you checked your schedule for next week?

lines.teochew: 睇了，我個時間排到滿滿了
lines.chinese: 看了，我的时间排满满的。
lines.pinyin: toin2 liao2, ua2 gai5(7) si5(7) gang1 bai5(7) gao3(2) muan2(6) muan2(3) liao2
lines.english: I saw it, my schedule is completely packed.

lines.teochew: 我也是，下個禮拜逐日有事。
lines.chinese: 我也是，下周几乎天天有事。
lines.pinyin: ua2 ia7 si6, ê6(7) gai5(7) loi2(1) bai3 dag8(4) rig8 u6(7) su7
lines.english: Me too, next week I’m busy almost every day.

lines.teochew: 只幾時時間過了真猛，覺得昨日扒魯正拜一啢
lines.chinese: 最近时间真的过很快，感觉昨天才刚礼拜一。
lines.pinyin: zi2(1) gui2(6) si5 si5(7) gang1 guê3(2) liao2(1) zing1 mên2, gag4 dêg4 za2(1) rig8 ba1(3) lu2 zian1 bai3(2) êg4 nia7
lines.english: Lately time has really flown, it feels like yesterday was just Monday.

lines.teochew: 是阿。加一下又愛月尾了。希望七月會使慢滴囝
lines.chinese: 是啊，多一下又要月底了。希望七月可以慢一点来。
lines.pinyin: si6 a1。gê1 zêg8(4) ê6(7) iu6(7) ain3(2) ghuêh8(4) bhuê2 liao2. hi1 mo7 cêg4(8) ghuêh8(4) oi6(7) sai2(1) mang7 dih4(8) gian2
lines.english: Yeah, soon it’ll be the end of the month again. I hope July comes a little slower.

lines.pinyin: gim1 rig8 tin1 si5 zai6(7) sên1?
lines.english: How’s the weather today?

lines.pinyin: gim1 rig8 zing1 ruah8, rig8(4) tao5 hoh4 dua7!
lines.english: It’s really hot today, the sun is blazing!

lines.chinese: 真的，我一出门就流汗了。
lines.pinyin: si6 a1, ua2 cug4(8) meng5 ziu6(7) lao5(7) guan7 liao2.
lines.english: Yeah, I started sweating as soon as I stepped outside.

lines.pinyin: lu2 u6(7) zag4 bho7 bho5?
lines.english: Did you bring a hat?

lines.pinyin: bho5, ua2 m6(7) gi3(2) dêg4 zag4
lines.english: No, I forgot to bring one.

lines.teochew: 按呢汝愛食佮㩼水，阿無會覺得不舒服
lines.chinese: 那你要多喝水，不然会觉得不舒服哦！
lines.pinyin: an1 ne1 lu2 ain3(2) ziah8(4) kah4(8) zoi7 zui2, a1(7) bho5 oi6(7) gag4(8) dêg4 bhoi6(7) su1 hog8
lines.english: Then you should drink more water, otherwise you’ll feel uncomfortable.

lines.pinyin: ghua7 kao2 loh8(4) hou6 liao2 bhuê7?
lines.english: Is it raining outside?

lines.pinyin: loh8 liao2, loh8(4) zing1 dua7, huan1 u6(7) lui5(7) gong1
lines.english: Yes, it’s pouring, and there’s even thunder.

lines.pinyin: an1 ne1 lu2 u6(7) zag4 hou6(7) zia1 bho5?
lines.english: Did you bring an umbrella then?

lines.pinyin: u6 a1, a1(7) bho5 cuang5(7) sêng1 oi6(7) dam5 liao2
lines.english: Yes, otherwise I’d be soaked all over.

lines.teochew: 汝真聪明，我就唔記得扎了。
lines.pinyin: lu2 zing1 cong1 mêng5, ua2 ziu6(7) m6(7) gi3(2) dêg4 zag4 liao2
lines.english: You’re smart, I totally forgot to bring mine.

lines.teochew: 只幾日個天时一下热，一下凝。
lines.chinese: 最近的天气一下热，一下冷。
lines.pinyin: zi2(1) gui2(6) rig8 gai5(7) tin1 si5 zêg8(4) ê7 ruah8, zêg8(4) ê7 ngang5.
lines.english: Recently the weather has been hot one moment, cold the next.

lines.teochew: 几日前天時真热，日頭真大，出门就流汗。
lines.chinese: 几天前天气很热，太阳很大，一出门就流汗。
lines.pinyin: gui2(1) rig8(4) zain5 tin1 si5 zing1 ruah8, rig8(4) tao5 zing1 dua7, cug4(8) meng5 ziu6(7) lao5(7) guan7.
lines.english: A few days ago it was very hot, the sun was strong, and I started sweating as soon as I went out.

lines.teochew: 但是昨日暗暝雨呾落就落，还有雷公。
lines.chinese: 可是昨天晚上雨说下就下，还有打雷。
lines.pinyin: dang6(7) si6(7) za2(1) rig8 am3(2) mên5 hou6 dan3(2) loh8 ziu6(7) loh8, huan1 u6(7) lui5(7) gong1.
lines.english: But last night it suddenly rained and thundered.

lines.pinyin: gim1 rig8 za2(6) ki2(3) ziu6(7) biang3(2) ngang5 liao2.
lines.english: And this morning it turned cold.

lines.teochew: 我只陣出门之前會睇睇今日会落雨不。
lines.chinese: 我现在出门前都会看看今天会不会下雨。
lines.pinyin: ua2 zi2(6) zung5 cug4(8) meng5 zi1 zain5 oi6(7) toin2(1) toin2(1) gim1 rig8 oi6(7) loh8(4) hou6 bhoi6.
lines.english: Now before going out, I always check if it will rain today.

lines.teochew: 按呢正會知愛穿乜個衫。
lines.chinese: 这样才知道要穿什么衣服。
lines.pinyin: an1 ne1 zia1 oi6(7) zai1 ain3(2) cêng7 mih4(8) gai5(7) san1.
lines.english: That way I know what to wear.

lines.pinyin: gu7 za2 ua2 siang5(7) su1 gah4 hê7 tin1.
lines.english: Before, I liked summer the most.

lines.teochew: 因为會使去𨑨迌、食霜膏、穿短綩。
lines.chinese: 因为可以去游泳、吃冰淇淋、穿短袖。
lines.pinyin: ing1 ui7 oi6(7) sai ke3(2) tig4 to5, ziah8(4) seng1 go1, cêng7 do2(6) ng2(3).
lines.english: Because I could go swimming, eat ice cream, and wear short sleeves.

lines.teochew: 但是只陣我愈更舒甲秋天。
lines.pinyin: dang6(7) si6(7) zi2(6) zung5 ua2 ru2(1) gêng1 su1 gah4 ciu1 tin1.
lines.english: But now I prefer autumn.

lines.teochew: 秋天不凝也不热，风也真凉，天時真舒服。
lines.chinese: 秋天不冷也不热，风很凉快，天气很舒服。
lines.pinyin: ciu1 tin1 bhoi6(7) ngang5 ia7 bhoi6(7) ruah8, huang1 ia7 zing1 liang5, tin1 si5 zing1 su1 hog8.
lines.english: Autumn is neither too cold nor too hot, the breeze is cool, and the weather is very comfortable.

lines.teochew: 有时天时佮特别，会发生一撮危险個事。
lines.chinese: 时候天气太特别，会发生一些灾害。
lines.pinyin: u6(7) si5 tin1 si5 kah4 dêg8(4) biag8, oi6(7) huag4(8) sên1 zêg8(4) coh4 ngui5(7) hiam2 gai5(7) su7.
lines.english: Sometimes when the weather is extreme, disasters can happen.

lines.teochew: 舊年夏天，續續落真㩼日個雨。
lines.chinese: 去年夏天，连续下很多天的雨。
lines.pinyin: gu7 ni5 hê7 tin1, sua3(2) sua3 loh8(4) zing1 zoi7 rig8 gai5(7) hou6.
lines.english: Last summer, it rained for many days in a row.

lines.pinyin: ao6(7) lai5 huag4(8) sên1 liao2(1) im1 zui2.
lines.english: Later flooding happened.

lines.teochew: 真㩼儂無變出门，車也無變駛。
lines.chinese: 很多人不能出门，车也不能开。
lines.pinyin: zing1 zoi7 nang5 bho5(7) biang3 cug4(8) meng5, cia1 ia7 bho5(7) biang3(2) sai2(3).
lines.english: Many people could not leave their homes, cars couldn’t drive.

lines.teochew: 有個儂個內还着淹水了。
lines.chinese: 有的人家里还被水淹了。
lines.pinyin: u6(7) gai5(7) nang5 gai5(7) lai6 huan1 dioh4 im1 zui2 liao2.
lines.english: Some people’s houses were flooded.

lines.chinese: 我也经历过一次小地震。
lines.pinyin: ua2 ia7 gêng1 guê3 zêg8(4) bai2(1) soi3(2) di7 zêng2.
lines.english: I also experienced a small earthquake.

lines.pinyin: he2(6) rig8 ua2 lo1 toin2(1) diang6(7) si6.
lines.english: That day I was watching TV.

lines.teochew: 还有一摆火燒，是在一間老厝。
lines.chinese: 还有一次火灾，是在一栋老房子。
lines.pinyin: huan1 u6(7) zêg8(4) bai2(1) huê2(1) sio1, si6(7) do6(7) zêg8(4) gain1 lao6(7) cu3.
lines.english: There was also a fire once, in an old house.

lines.teochew: 只陣我會知了，天時虽然我儂無變控制。
lines.chinese: 现在我知道了，天气虽然我们不能控制。
lines.pinyin: zi2(6) zung5 ua2 oi6(7) zai1 liao2, tin1 si5 sui1 riang5 ua2 nang5 bho5(7) biang3(2) kong3(2) zi3.
lines.english: Now I know, although we cannot control the weather.

lines.chinese: 但是我们可以早点准备。
lines.pinyin: dang6(7) si6(7) ua2 nang5 oi6(7) sai2(1) za2 zung2(1) bi6.
lines.english: But we can prepare earlier.

lines.teochew: 若是有发生事，我儂勿緊張。
lines.chinese: 若是有发生事情，我们别紧张。
lines.pinyin: na7 si6(7) u6(7) huag4(8) sên1, ua2 nang5 mai3(2) gêng2(1) ziang1.
lines.english: If something happens, we should not panic.

lines.pinyin: bo2(1) hu6(7) ho2(1) ga1 gi7 gah4 gê1 nang5.
lines.english: We must protect ourselves and our family.

lines.pinyin: pêng5(7) ang1 gai5(7) rig8 zi2 siang6(7) ciag4(8) iao3.
lines.english: Peaceful days are the most important.
